normalized: 20xx a.
d.
japan is plagued by evil spirits that dwell in the shadows.
the implicit rule of non-interference has been respectedbetween human and demons since ancient times.
but some humans have started weaving dark pacts;crime syndicates become suffused with demonic influence.
the age is fraught with chaos and decadence.
however, the righteous are not without recourse.
the government assembles a team composed of ninjaable to fight back against the demons, opposing the corrupt and the sinful.
they are the taimanin.
the flickering moon casts its golden light upon a skyscraper.
many hundreds of meters above the streets.
on the rooftop, three silhouettes are buffeted by the wind.
two women, one man.
the woman breaking the silence has red ribbons in her hair.
shift us like always.
both her body and voice are befitting a maiden.
her name is mizuki yukikaze.
we have to wait until the guards leave the room.
the reply came from the buxom woman next to her,akiyama rinko.

name: yukikaze
normalized: roger.
the raging wind drowns out their words.
however, their equipped earphones makesthe conversation possible between the two partners.
rinko narrows her eyes, staring into the distance.
a seemingly endless urban jungle lies in front of her.
at this late hour, most of the manyoffice buildings are unlit and empty.
waiting for their time, yukikaze and rinko stand perfectly still.
only their hair is fluttering in the wind.
beget by the shadows and vanishing into shadows,they are ninjas.
on the other hand, the man behind them fidgets restlessly.
obviously nervous,he exudes a lack of experience and confidence.

name: rinko
normalized: …tatsurou.
rinko suddenly speaks.

name: tatsurou
normalized: y-yes.
the nervous man, akiyama tatsurou, answers with a jolt.

name: rinko
normalized: how about calming down a bit?
rinko chides him lightly.

name: tatsurou
normalized: y-yes!
rinko-ane!
his reply isn't steady in the slightest.
yukikaze glances at tatsurou.
the sad sight brings a disappointed expression on her face.

name: yukikaze
normalized: …sigh.
even their cutting-edge earphonesfail to pick up her minuscule sigh.
of course, tatsurou doesn't catch it either.

name: rinko
normalized: fufu…
still staring into space, rinko let out a chuckle.

name: rinko
normalized: tatsurou, calm down you fool,you want to look good in front of yukikaze, right?

name: yukikaze
normalized: wha-!?

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh, ah, that…

name: rinko
normalized: if you keep being so clumsy,yukikaze will grow sick of you.

name: tatsurou
normalized: t-that's…err, it's…

name: yukikaze
normalized: rinko-senpai!
since tatsurou is too embarrassed to speak,yukikaze raises her voice in his stead.
her cheeks are dyed red.

name: rinko
normalized: yukikaze, even if he's your childhood friend andyou both look very much in love,even you will get tired of this little brother of mine.

name: yukikaze
normalized: wha- i-i'm not really!

name: tatsurou
normalized: …yukikaze.

name: yukikaze
normalized: d-don't look at me with those discarded puppy's eyes.
stupid.

name: rinko
normalized: you're not going to be much of a couple at this rate.
while it's fun for me to goad you,don't you want your relationship to progress, yukikaze?

name: yukikaze
normalized: hauu, senpai.

name: rinko
normalized: please take care of my feckless younger brother, yukikaze.

name: yukikaze
normalized: w-we're on a mission right now, senpai!

name: tatsurou
normalized: t-that's right, rinko-ane!
yukikaze and tatsurou act in unison.
the aura they projected moments ago has utterly vanished――though tatsurou didnt have any to begin with.
they are reduced to young boys and girls acting their age.

name: rinko
normalized: ooh, right.
well then, ladies and gentlemen,let's return to our jobs as elite ninja.
rinko declares with a straight face.
these three are taimanin.
and they are here for business.
right now, their mission is about to begin.

name: yukikaze
normalized: …ahem.
regaining her composure, yukikaze clears her throat.

name: yukikaze
normalized: how many guards are there?
she asks rinko.

name: rinko
normalized: fufu…let's see, there are still 10 guards there.
during the entire conversation, rinko never averted her eyes,not even while replying.
she seems to be intently peering at something.
and while it may looks like she's staring into the void,she's indeed scrutinizing a precise place.
it is located behind the buildings, way out of sight.
amongst taimanin, no two have the same ability.
each of them has a special skill, called ninpou.
rinko has the ability of shifting through space.
she's a user of the ninpou "void arts".
right now, she's shifting her visionto a room 1 kilometer behind the buildings.

name: rinko
normalized: now that the guards have been posted,the target's meeting is starting.

name: rinko
normalized: there are 10 guards close to the target, with 20 more outside.
moreover…they are only concealing as humans…

name: rinko
normalized: we can expect additional security at every checkpoint,so we may be talking about a hundred guards.
fufufu…it seems the target is quite scared of us.

name: yukikaze
normalized: we'll ignore the security outside for now.
that leaves the 10 guards surrounding the target.
it's within our abilities.
let's shift, rinko-senpai.
from the data gathered by rinko, yukikaze formulates a plan.

name: rinko
normalized: no objections.
however, shifting outside of my usual vision rangeis dangerous, you know?
one mistake and it's all over,we'll be buried in a wall.
before rinko's eyes towers a skyscraper dyed in darkness.

name: yukikaze
normalized: if it's rinko-senpai's "void arts" then we'll be safe.
yukikaze replies without hesitation.

name: rinko
normalized: so she says, tatsurou, what about you?
rinko asks the still silent tatsurou.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i-i also have faith in rinko's technique.

name: rinko
normalized: oh, thank you.
rinko evenly thanks her nervous brother.
sight is not required for a shift.
that is the true strength of rinko's "void arts".
one or many bodies can be warped in an heartbeat.
as rinko would say, 「from this void to another」.
this is the true extent of her skill.

name: rinko
normalized: then, here we go.
moving her arms with a dancer's grace,rinko forms esoteric hand signs.
light glows under her feet.
soon, that light also swallows yukikaze and tatsurou.
